thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 04 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Global Bio-Chem Technology Group Says Dacheng Industrial & GP To Become Shareholders Of JV Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global Bio-Chem Technology Group Says Dacheng Industrial & GP To Become Shareholders Of JV Co

organizations.name: global bio-chem technology group co ltd
brief-global bio-chem technology group says dacheng industrial & gp to become shareholders of jv co

text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Global Bio-chem Technology Group Co Ltd :
* DACHENG INDUSTRIAL & GP TO BECOME SHAREHOLDERS OF JV COMPANY
* DACHENG BIO-TECH TO MAKE CONTRIBUTION OF RMB78 MILLION, DACHENG INDUSTRIAL & GP TO CONTRIBUTE RMB10.1 MILLION AND RMB60 MILLION
* ANNUAL DIVIDENDS TO BE DECLARED SHALL BE WITHIN RANGE OF 10% TO 40% OF DISTRIBUTABLE PROFITS FOR THAT FY
* TO APPLY TO CSRC FOR LISTING OF JV WITHIN 5 YEARS FROM DATE OF COMPLETION OR TIME AGREED BY DACHENG INDUSTRIAL & GP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
